appDesc.message: Email Extractor tool that save time and efforts. Forget copy and paste ache. It collects emails as you browse websites.

badEval.message: Oh, Snap! Looks like we should do something right now! Please drop us a line at me@ashutoshksingh.com with your suggestions or ask any question<hr>

optInfo.message: Let this tool send us emails you collect so we build better database.

optInfo2.message: Help us bring better value by allowing Email Hunter to anonymously track and identify the most popular websites along with emails.
